trans-unit.source: Represents an installed speech synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: 表示已安裝的語音合成引擎。

trans-unit.source: A voice is an installed speech synthesis engine, which is also referred to as a text-to-speech engine or a TTS engine.
trans-unit.target: 語音是已安裝的語音合成引擎，也稱為文字轉換語音引擎或 TTS 引擎。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object uses a voice to generate speech from text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>物件會從文字產生語音使用語音。

trans-unit.source: The properties of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> object identify a voice and describe its characteristics.
trans-unit.target: 內容<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>物件識別語音，並說明其特性。

trans-unit.source: The most defining characteristic of a voice is its <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Culture%2A>, which defines the single language that a voice can speak.
trans-unit.target: 語音最定義特性是其<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Culture%2A>，而後者可定義聲音可以宣告單一語言。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Voice%2A> property returns a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> object that contains information about the current voice in use by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Voice%2A>屬性會傳回<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>物件，其中包含目前正在使用的語音資訊<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>。

trans-unit.source: You can also use a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> object to get information about any of the voices that are installed on the system, as returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices> method.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>取得任何已安裝在系統中，語音的資訊，所傳回的物件<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.GetInstalledVoices>方法。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice> for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.InstalledVoice>。

trans-unit.source: The following example is part of a console application that initializes a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object and outputs to the console a list of the installed voices (engines for speech synthesis) and demonstrates the information that is available for each voice.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例是主控台應用程式，以初始化一部分<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>物件輸出至主控台已安裝的語音 （語音合成引擎） 的清單，並示範可供每個語音的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets additional information about the voice.
trans-unit.target: 取得語音的其他相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of name/value pairs that describe and identify the voice.
trans-unit.target: 傳回描述及識別語音的名稱/值組的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the age of the voice.
trans-unit.target: 取得語音的年齡。

trans-unit.source: Returns the age of the voice.
trans-unit.target: 傳回語音的年齡。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Age%2A> property gets a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceAge> enumeration that indicates the age of the voice.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Age%2A>屬性取得的成員<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceAge>列舉，指出語音的年齡。

trans-unit.source: Gets the culture of the voice.
trans-unit.target: 取得語音的文化特性。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object that provides information about a specific culture, such as the names of the culture, the writing system, the calendar used, and how to format dates and sort strings.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> 物件，提供特定文化特性的相關資訊，例如文化特性名稱、書寫系統、使用的行事曆，以及如何格式化日期和排序字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> class specifies a unique name for each culture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>類別會指定每個文化特性的唯一名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name is a combination of an ISO 639 two-letter lowercase culture code associated with a language and an ISO 3166 two-letter uppercase subculture code associated with a country or region.
trans-unit.target: 名稱是與語言相關聯的 ISO 639 兩個字母小寫文化特性代碼和國家或地區相關聯的 ISO 3166 雙字母大寫子代碼的組合。

trans-unit.source: Examples of culture names include "es-US" for Spanish as spoken in the US, or "fr-CA" for French as spoken in Canada.
trans-unit.target: 文化特性名稱的範例包含"es US"代表西班牙文的法文，加拿大所說出在美國或"fr CA 」。

trans-unit.source: You can specify a neutral culture by using only the two-digit lowercase language code.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用兩個字母小寫語言程式碼，以指定中性文化特性。

trans-unit.source: For example, "fr" specifies the neutral culture for French, and "de" specifies the neutral culture for German.
trans-unit.target: 例如，"fr"的法文指定中性文化特性，而"de"德文指定中性文化特性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the description of the voice.
trans-unit.target: 取得語音的描述。

trans-unit.source: Returns the description of the voice.
trans-unit.target: 傳回語音的描述。

trans-unit.source: The specified <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Compares the fields of the voice with the specified <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo" /> object to determine whether they contain the same values.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的<see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo" />物件來比較語音的欄位，以判斷它們是否包含相同的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="True" /> if the fields of the two <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo" /> objects are equal; otherwise returns <see langword="False" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo" /> 物件的欄位相等，則傳回 <see langword="True" />，否則傳回 <see langword="False" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Equals%2A> method takes a <xref:System.Object> type as its parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Equals%2A>方法會採用<xref:System.Object>做為其參數的型別。

trans-unit.source: If that object is not of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo> type, the method returns `False`.
trans-unit.target: 如果該物件不是<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo>輸入，此方法會傳回`False`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the gender of the voice.
trans-unit.target: 取得語音的性別。

trans-unit.source: Returns the gender of the voice.
trans-unit.target: 傳回語音的性別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A> property gets a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceGender> enumeration that indicates the gender of the voice.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo.Gender%2A>屬性取得的成員<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceGender>列舉，指出語音的性別。

trans-unit.source: Provides a hash code for a <c>VoiceInfo</c> object.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <c>VoiceInfo</c> 物件的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.VoiceInfo" /> 物件的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the ID of the voice.
trans-unit.target: 取得語音的 ID。

trans-unit.source: Returns the identifier for the voice.
trans-unit.target: 傳回語音的識別項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the voice.
trans-unit.target: 取得語音的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the voice.
trans-unit.target: 傳回語音的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of audio formats that the voice supports.
trans-unit.target: 取得語音支援的音訊格式集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of the audio formats that the voice supports.
trans-unit.target: 傳回語音支援的音訊格式集合。
